about.description:
The LSC Algorithm Pulsar Library for gravitational wave data analysis.
This package contains the python bindings.

name: python-lalpulsar
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.18.7
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: python-lalpulsar
    version: 1.18.0

    url: http://software.ligo.org/lscsoft/source/lalsuite/lalpulsar-1.18.0.tar.xz

    ignore_run_exports:

        - libcblas 3.8.0 5_h6e990d7_netlib
        - libffi 3.2.1 he1b5a44_1006
        - libgcc-ng 9.1.0 hdf63c60_0
        - libgfortran-ng 7.3.0 hdf63c60_0
        - liblapack 3.8.0 5_h6e990d7_netlib

about:
    description: 'The LSC Algorithm Pulsar Library for gravitational wave data analysis.

extra:
